thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.entry:
MAS OS - Ready.
What are your commands ?
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.go-to-scroll-logs: Look up Vellum Scroll's personal log
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.lookup-sentinel-imprint: Look up Sentinel magical imprint process
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.scroll-logs/holodisk-entry:
MA OS - The program executed successfully.

2 files modified
387 files destroyed
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.scroll-logs/searched: You successfully gained access to Vellum Scroll's personal logs.
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.search-computer: Search the computer for anything interesting
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.search-failure: Some hidden file has caught your attention, but it's access protected, and you just couldn't manage to read them.
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.search-over: You look upon the files, and see nothing that catch your interest.
thornhoof/laboratory/laboratory-terminal.sentinel-lookup/searched: You hacked your way into some suspicious encrypted files. They are design documents for a sensible project called Sentinel.
